__e: I've been getting it all day from these stupid 20-somethings.
I hate you both! You're stupid, and I hate you!
Well,your side hates my side because you think we think you're stupid, and my side hates your side because we think you're stupid.
I think they're too stupid to get the message.
I'm not going to lose everything because you people are too stupid to secure your own operation.
One of those things where they should've known better, but they were too stupid to think it through.
They're so stupid they'll lead us right to what we're looking for.
She told me how proud she was that you managed to avoid all the stupid mistakes she made in life.
"that are so stupid they're giving it away."
Like that all this is real, and we have to deal with it... no matter how crazy it seems.
Only fools aren't frightened when there's something to be frightened about.
This love thing makes you all quite stupid, doesn't it?
